Detailed Description

Storage device filter filtering storage devices by a name pattern.

Class NamePatternStorageDeviceFilter is a predefined storage device filter functor which filters storage devices by comparing the storage device Id string to a name pattern which is allowed to contain the asterisk * and/or question mark ? wildcards.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

NamePatternStorageDeviceFilter::NamePatternStorageDeviceFilter (  const WString &  name_pattern  ) 
 

Constructs a name pattern storage device filter. The filter is initialized with the name pattern which is allowed to contain the wildcards * and/or ?.

Parameters:
name_pattern A name pattern optionally using wildcards * and/or ?.

Tells if the device Id string of device complies with the name pattern m_name_pattern.
